title: Topic 004 Question 063
body: Your company uses Azure DevOps and Microsoft Azure Active Directory (Azure AD), part of Microsoft Entra.
Only users who have accounts in Azure AD can access the Azure DevOps environment.
You need to ensure that only devices that are connected to the on-premises network can access the Azure DevOps environment.
options: Assign the Stakeholder access level to all users.
In Azure DevOps, configure Security in Project Settings.
In Azure AD, configure conditional access.
In Azure AD, configure risky sign-ins.
